item.title: Victure PC420
item.description: Victure PC420 Baby Monitor Requirements Victure PC420 baby monitor camera with power cord USB to TTL adapter (Shikra, DSD Tech USB to TTL, etc.) Micro SD (at least 20 MB) Micro SD to USB adapter 3 Female to male jumper wires Computer

item.title: Router Lab
item.description: WiFi Lab Information SSID: iot-hack-lab Password: saintcon2021 Target CIDR: 172.21.0.1/24 nmap -sn -PS21,22,80,8000,8080 172.21.0.1/24 Please don’t ruin things for other people.
